LanguageData.I_EMBloodBig.label: Tattoo kit (insectoid - large)
LanguageData.I_EMBloodBig.description: A set of carefully prepared inks and templates used to tattoo the design of an insectoid, there is enough here for a large tattoo on someones chest or back. This design increases blood pumping by a sizeable amount. It will also reduce learning speed a little.
LanguageData.I_EMBloodMed.label: Tattoo kit (insectoid - medium)
LanguageData.I_EMBloodMed.description: A set of carefully prepared inks and templates used to tattoo the design of an insectoid, there is enough here for a sizeable tattoo on an arm or leg. This design increases blood pumping by a modest amount. It will also reduce learning speed a little.
LanguageData.I_EMBloodSma.label: Tattoo kit (insectoid - small)
LanguageData.I_EMBloodSma.description: A set of carefully prepared inks and templates used to tattoo the design of an insectoid, there is enough here for a small tattoo on a hand or foot. This design increases blood pumping a little. It will also reduce learning speed a little.
LanguageData.I_EMBreakBig.label: Tattoo kit (muffalo - large)
LanguageData.I_EMBreakBig.description: A set of carefully prepared inks and templates used to tattoo the design of a muffalo, there is enough here for a large tattoo on someones chest or back. This design increases mental break threshold by a sizeable amount. Makes movement a little slower.
LanguageData.I_EMBreakMed.label: Tattoo kit (muffalo - medium)
LanguageData.I_EMBreakMed.description: A set of carefully prepared inks and templates used to tattoo the design of a muffalo, there is enough here for a sizeable tattoo on an arm or leg. This design increases mental break threshold by a modest amount. Makes movement a little slower.
LanguageData.I_EMBreakSma.label: Tattoo kit (muffalo - small)
LanguageData.I_EMBreakSma.description: A set of carefully prepared inks and templates used to tattoo the design of a cobra, there is enough here for a small tattoo on a hand or foot. This design increases mental break threshold a little. Makes movement a little slower.
LanguageData.I_EMConBig.label: Tattoo kit (mechanoid - large)
LanguageData.I_EMConBig.description: A set of carefully prepared inks and templates used to tattoo the design of a mechanoid, there is enough here for a large tattoo on someones chest or back. This design increases consciousness by a sizeable amount, it is also scary for others to look at.

LanguageData.I_EMConMed.description: A set of carefully prepared inks and templates used to tattoo the design of a mechanoid, there is enough here for a sizeable tattoo on an arm or leg. This design increases consciousness by a modest amount, it is also scary for others to look at.
LanguageData.I_EMConSma.label: Tattoo kit (mechanoid - small)
LanguageData.I_EMConSma.description: A set of carefully prepared inks and templates used to tattoo the design of a mechanoid, there is enough here for a small tattoo on a hand or foot. This design increases consciousness a little, it is also scary for others to look at.
LanguageData.I_EMManipBig.label: Tattoo kit (monkey - large)
LanguageData.I_EMManipBig.description: A set of carefully prepared inks and templates used to tattoo the design of a monkey, there is enough here for a large tattoo on someones chest or back. This design increases manipulation by a sizeable amount. Psychic phenomena are a little more effective too.
LanguageData.I_EMManipMed.label: Tattoo kit (monkey - medium)
LanguageData.I_EMManipMed.description: A set of carefully prepared inks and templates used to tattoo the design of a monkey, there is enough here for a sizeable tattoo on an arm or leg. This design increases manipulation by a modest amount. Psychic phenomena are a little more effective too.
LanguageData.I_EMManipSma.label: Tattoo kit (monkey - small)
LanguageData.I_EMManipSma.description: A set of carefully prepared inks and templates used to tattoo the design of a monkey, there is enough here for a small tattoo on a hand or foot. This design increases manipulation a little. Psychic phenomena are a little more effective too.
LanguageData.I_EMMeleeBig.label: Tattoo kit (rose - large)
LanguageData.I_EMMeleeBig.description: A set of carefully prepared inks and templates used to tattoo the design of a rose, there is enough here for a large tattoo on someones chest or back. This design increases melee ability by a sizeable amount. It will also reduce pain threshold a little.
LanguageData.I_EMMeleeMed.label: Tattoo kit (rose - medium)
LanguageData.I_EMMeleeMed.description: A set of carefully prepared inks and templates used to tattoo the design of a rose, there is enough here for a sizeable tattoo on an arm or leg. This design increases melee ability by a modest amount. It will also reduce pain threshold a little.

LanguageData.I_EMMeleeSma.description: A set of carefully prepared inks and templates used to tattoo the design of a rose, there is enough here for a small tattoo on a hand or foot. This design increases melee ability a little. It will also reduce pain threshold a little.
LanguageData.I_EMPainBig.label: Tattoo kit (thrumbo - large)
LanguageData.I_EMPainBig.description: A set of carefully prepared inks and templates used to tattoo the design of a thrumbo, there is enough here for a large tattoo on someones chest or back. This design decreases pain by a sizeable amount. Will make you a little more susceptible to the elements.

LanguageData.I_EMPainMed.description: A set of carefully prepared inks and templates used to tattoo the design of a thrumbo, there is enough here for a sizeable tattoo on an arm or leg. This design decreases pain by a modest amount. Will make you a little more susceptible to the elements.

LanguageData.I_EMPainSma.description: A set of carefully prepared inks and templates used to tattoo the design of a thrumbo, there is enough here for a small tattoo on a hand or foot. This design decreases pain a little. Will make you a little more susceptible to the elements.

LanguageData.I_EMShootBig.description: A set of carefully prepared inks and templates used to tattoo the design of a sun, there is enough here for a large tattoo on someones chest or back. This design increases shooting ability by a sizeable amount. It will also reduce work speed a little.

LanguageData.I_EMShootSma.description: A set of carefully prepared inks and templates used to tattoo the design of a sun, there is enough here for a small tattoo on a hand or foot. This design increases shooting ability a little. It will also reduce work speed a little.
LanguageData.I_EMSpeedBig.label: Tattoo kit (cobra - large)
LanguageData.I_EMSpeedBig.description: A set of carefully prepared inks and templates used to tattoo the design of a cobra, there is enough here for a large tattoo on someones chest or back. This design increases speed by a sizeable amount. May make eating a time-consuming process.

LanguageData.I_EMSpeedMed.description: A set of carefully prepared inks and templates used to tattoo the design of a cobra, there is enough here for a sizeable tattoo on an arm or leg. This design increases speed by a modest amount. May make eating a time-consuming process.
